backend/main.mo: Defines the backend canister with user, room, game, turn, and stats types plus storage maps and Google OAuth config defaults.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking documentation requirements to affected files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of many frontend files describing UI components, game logic modules, and PWA assets.
frontend/deploy/Caddyfile: Caddy reverse proxy config showing how to route a custom domain to the frontend canister with HTTPS, SPA routing, caching, and security headers.
frontend/deploy/nginx.conf: Nginx reverse proxy config for serving the frontend canister with HTTPS, SPA routing, caching rules, and security headers.
frontend/docs/configuration.md: Explains all frontend and backend configuration values, including Google OAuth keys, their defaults, and where they are set.
frontend/docs/deployment.md: Deployment guide covering prerequisites, local development, production deployment, health checks, and optional reverse proxy setup.
frontend/docs/game-snapshot-contract.md: Documentation defining the canonical game snapshot format used for backend responses and realtime sync.
frontend/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and extensive CSS variables for light and dark themes with global styling applies.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting metadata, icons, manifest, and mounts the React app.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest describing app metadata, colors, start URL, and icons.
frontend/public/service-worker.js: Service worker handling caching, offline support, SPA routing, and proxy‑friendly fetch logic.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up the TanStack Router with all application routes and wraps the app in the router provider.
frontend/src/components/game/GameOverScr: Displays a game‑over card showing winner info and action buttons for stats, rematch, or new game.
frontend/src/components/game/Keypad.tsx: Renders a numeric keypad with quick‑score chips and optional voice input for score entry.
Shows a player’s name, remaining score, and active status with styled UI elements.
frontend/src/components/game/ResumeSaved: Modal prompting the user to resume or discard a saved in‑progress game.
frontend/src/components/game/ThreeDartsE: UI for entering up to three darts with multipliers, numbers, bull options, and submission logic.
frontend/src/components/game/TurnHistory: Shows the last five turns in a table with score, remaining points, and status icons, formatting dart details for each turn.
frontend/src/components/game/VoiceScoreC: Modal dialog that displays recognized voice input and lets the user confirm or edit the proposed score.
frontend/src/components/rooms/ClaimSeatP: Panel allowing authenticated users to claim unassigned player seats, handling success and error states.
frontend/src/components/rooms/DisplaySco: Displays player remaining scores and highlights the active player, or shows a winner summary when the game is over.
frontend/src/components/rooms/GameSettin: Form for creating a game with mode, double-out option, and 1–4 players including assignment to guest or self.
frontend/src/components/rooms/HostLiveSc: Host interface for entering scores, undoing turns, and viewing current player states during live scoring.
frontend/src/components/rooms/RecentTurn: Read‑only table of the last ten turns showing player, score, remaining points, and win/bust status.
frontend/src/components/rooms/RoomCodeDi: Displays a room code with a copy-to-clipboard button and visual feedback.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Initializes and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, invalidating dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useGameDetails.ts: Fetches metadata for a specific game using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useGameHistory.ts: Provides hooks to fetch a user's game history and paginated game turns from the backend.
frontend/src/hooks/useGameRealtime.ts: Subscribes to realtime game events via WebSocket transport and exposes connection state.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity authentication, providing identity state, login, and logout through context.
frontend/src/hooks/useMyProfile.ts: Fetches the current user's profile and exposes loading state dependent on actor availability.
frontend/src/hooks/usePlayerGameStats.ts: Retrieves player game statistics by game or user using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useSession.ts: Wraps Internet Identity to provide app-level authentication helpers like sign-in and sign-out.
Implements speech recognition support with start/stop controls and transcript handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserStats.ts: Fetches statistics for the current user or a specific user via the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/layouts/AppLayout.tsx: Layout component with header, auth buttons, service worker registration, routed content, and footer.
frontend/src/lib/adminTokenStorage.ts: LocalStorage helpers to get, set, and clear admin tokens per room code.
frontend/src/lib/checkoutSuggestions.ts: Generates up to three popular dart checkout suggestions for valid scores when Double Out is enabled.
frontend/src/lib/gameCore.ts: Core game logic providing state types and functions for starting a game and applying three‑dart turns with double‑out rules.
frontend/src/lib/gamePersistence.ts: LocalStorage utilities for saving, loading, migrating, and clearing saved game state.
frontend/src/lib/gameSettings.ts: Defines game settings and handles saving, loading, validating, and sanitizing settings in localStorage.
frontend/src/lib/gameStats.ts: Computes per‑player statistics such as averages, 180s, busts, and checkout percentages from game history.
frontend/src/lib/playerDisplayName.ts: Helpers to pick a player's display name and detect unclaimed player seats.
frontend/src/lib/realtimeEventEnvelope.t: Defines realtime event schemas, game snapshot structure, and parsing/validation utilities.
frontend/src/lib/realtimeTransport.ts: Implements a WebSocket-based realtime transport with automatic reconnection and a fallback mode when WebSockets are unsupported.
frontend/src/lib/roomGameApi.ts: Provides functions for creating games, adding players, and submitting scores, including backend error parsing.
frontend/src/lib/roomsApi.ts: Contains utilities for generating room codes and creating or fetching rooms via backend actors.
frontend/src/lib/voiceScoreParser.ts: Parses spoken English phrases into numeric dart scores, handling direct numbers, tens, teens, and compound expressions.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/GameDetailsPage.tsx: Displays detailed game info and paginated turns, handling invalid IDs and loading states.
frontend/src/pages/GameHistoryPage.tsx: Shows authenticated users their game history with filters and pagination, prompting sign‑in when needed.
frontend/src/pages/GamePage.tsx: Main gameplay page managing game state, input modes, voice scoring, and realtime updates.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Login screen handling Internet Identity sign‑in and redirecting authenticated users.
frontend/src/pages/MyAccountPage.tsx: Legacy account route that redirects users to the profile page after a short delay.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Profile screen showing user info, stats, and authentication state with sign‑in or setup prompts.
frontend/src/pages/RegisterPage.tsx: User registration page allowing authenticated users to create a profile with username and email.
frontend/src/pages/RoomDisplayTvPage.tsx: Read‑only TV display for a room’s live game, showing realtime snapshots and connection status.
frontend/src/pages/RoomHostScorerPage.ts: Host page for creating and managing a room game, handling admin tokens, authentication, and live scoring updates.
frontend/src/pages/StartGamePage.tsx: UI for starting a local game or creating/joining a multi-device room, including player setup and room token handling.
frontend/src/pages/StatsPage.tsx: Displays statistics for the most recently saved game and allows navigation back to the game or home.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for retrieving, storing, and clearing URL or session-based parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme extensions, colors, animations, and enabled plugins.
project_state.json: Holds the current project state, including plans to add full user authentication to the Dart Scoring app and detailed architectural notes for the frontend UI, routing, and game-state persistence. Also lists existing implemented features and related metadata.
